p: The general inhibitory values of the CSEs 2– 9 increase in the following order, mono-cinnamoyl moieties < di-cinnamoyl ≤ tri-cinnamoyl < tetra-cinnamoyl. The diisopropylidene bridges and acetyl groups have a modest impact on the inhibition values. In many aspects, the investigated CSEs showed similar trends observed in the case of FSEs but also contrasted in some aspects.
